--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "Daniel Paul Hightower" 
<dph_of_rules@u...> wrote:
> Ok, what is the favorite scenario of everybody to play through?  
What 
> is the scenario you most enjoy completing?

I liked the original battle against the Blue people. It was epic, the 
diary entries were of good quality, and you could see parts of the 
previous map. I would have liked to see the Blue people series 
completed and ending with having to kill that big skeleton thingy, but 
it seems that all of the game's series lead to dead ends.
